    • addMember

      public void addMember​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String profile) throws exceptions.BadEntryException, exceptions.MemberAlreadyExistsException
      Description copied from interface: opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Add a new member to the SocialNetwork
      Specified by:
      addMember in interface opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Parameters:
      login - the new member's login
      password - the new member's password
      profile - a free String describing the new member's profile
      Throws:
      exceptions.BadEntryException -
      • if login is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if password is not instantiated or contains less than four characters (not taking into account leading or trailing blanks)
      • if profile is not instantiated

      exceptions.MemberAlreadyExistsException - if a member with the same login is already registered in the SocialNetwork (same login : not case-sensitive and leadings/trailings blanks are not taken into account)

    • addItemFilm

      public void addItemFilm​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String kind, java.lang.String director, java.lang.String scenarist, int duration) throws exceptions.BadEntryException, exceptions.NotMemberException, exceptions.ItemFilmAlreadyExistsException
      Description copied from interface: opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Add a new film to the SocialNetwork
      Specified by:
      addItemFilm in interface opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Parameters:
      login - login of the member adding the film
      password - password of the member adding the film
      title - the new film's title
      kind - the new film's kind (adventure, thriller, etc.)
      director - the new film's director
      scenarist - the new film's scenarist
      duration - the new film's duration (in minutes)
      Throws:
      exceptions.BadEntryException -
      • if login is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if password is not instantiated or contains less than four characters (not taking into account leading or trailing blanks)
      • if title is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if kind is not instanciated
      • if director is not instanciated
      • if scenarist is not instanciated
      • if duration is not stricly positive

      exceptions.NotMemberException - if login does not match with the login of a registered member in SocialNetwork or if password does not correspond to his registered password.
      exceptions.ItemFilmAlreadyExistsException - : a film with the same title is already registered in the SocialNetwork (same title : not case-sensitive and leadings/trailings blanks are not taken into account)

    • addItemBook

      public void addItemBook​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String kind, java.lang.String author, int nbPages) throws exceptions.BadEntryException, exceptions.NotMemberException, exceptions.ItemBookAlreadyExistsException
      Description copied from interface: opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Add a new book to the SocialNetwork
      Specified by:
      addItemBook in interface opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Parameters:
      login - login of the member adding the book
      password - password of the member adding the book
      title - the new book's title
      kind - the new book's kind (adventure, thriller, etc.)
      author - the new book's author
      nbPages - number of pages of the new book's
      Throws:
      exceptions.BadEntryException -
      • if login is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if password is not instantiated or contains less than four characters (not taking into account leading or trailing blanks)
      • if title is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if kind is not instanciated
      • if author is not instanciated
      • if nbPages is not stricly positive

      exceptions.NotMemberException - if login does not match with the login of a registered member in SocialNetwork or if password does not correspond to his registered password.
      exceptions.ItemBookAlreadyExistsException - a book with the same title is already registered in the SocialNetwork (same title : not case-sensitive and leadings/trailings blanks are not taken into account)

    • reviewItemFilm

      public float reviewItemFilm​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String title, float mark, java.lang.String comment) throws exceptions.BadEntryException, exceptions.NotMemberException, exceptions.NotItemException
      Description copied from interface: opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Add in the SocialNetwork a new review for a film on behalf of a specific member.
      If this member has already given a review for this same film before, the new review replaces the previous one.
      Specified by:
      reviewItemFilm in interface opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Parameters:
      login - login of the member adding the review
      password - password of the member adding the review
      title - the reviewed film's title
      mark - the mark given by the member for this film
      comment - the comment given by the member for this film
      Returns:
      mean of the marks for this film
      Throws:
      exceptions.BadEntryException -
      • if login is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if password is not instantiated or contains less than four characters (not taking into account leading or trailing blanks)
      • if title is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if mark is not greater or equals to 0.0 and lesser or equals to 5.0.
      • if comment is not instantiated

      exceptions.NotMemberException - if login does not match with the login of a registered member in SocialNetwork or if password does not correspond to his registered password.
      exceptions.NotItemException - if title is not registered as a film's title in the SocialNetwork

    • reviewItemBook

      public float reviewItemBook​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String title, float mark, java.lang.String comment) throws exceptions.BadEntryException, exceptions.NotMemberException, exceptions.NotItemException
      Description copied from interface: opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Add in the SocialNetwork a new review for a book on behalf of a specific member.
      If this member has already given a review for this same book before, the new review replaces the previous one.
      Specified by:
      reviewItemBook in interface opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Parameters:
      login - login of the member adding the review
      password - password of the member adding the review
      title - the reviewed book's title
      mark - the mark given by the member for this book
      comment - the comment given by the member for this book
      Returns:
      mean of the marks for this book
      Throws:
      exceptions.BadEntryException -
      • if login is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if password is not instantiated or contains less than four characters (not taking into account leading or trailing blanks)
      • if title is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if mark is not greater or equals to 0.0 and lesser or equals to 5.0.
      • if comment is not instantiated

      exceptions.NotMemberException - if login does not match with the login of a registered member in SocialNetwork or if password does not correspond to his registered password.
      exceptions.NotItemException - if title is not registered as a book's title in the SocialNetwork

    • consultItems

      public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> consultItems​(java.lang.String title) throws exceptions.BadEntryException
      Description copied from interface: opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Search for items in the SocialNetwork.
      Specified by:
      consultItems in interface opinion.ISocialNetwork
      Parameters:
      title - title of searched item(s)
      Returns:
      LinkedList a list of String representing all items (book and/or film) matching the searched name.
      Each String will contain at least the score of the corresponding item.
      Throws:
      exceptions.BadEntryException - if title is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character

    • searchFilmByTitle

      public opinion.Film searchFilmByTitle​(java.lang.String title)
      Search a film among the film list of the social network using the given title.
      Parameters:
      title - film's title
      Returns:
      Film object if the film is found, else null.

    • searchBookByTitle

      public opinion.Book searchBookByTitle​(java.lang.String title)
      Search a book among the book list of the social network using the given title.
      Parameters:
      title - book's title.
      Returns:
      Book object if the book is found, else null.

    • authenticateMember

      public opinion.Member authenticateMember​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password) throws exceptions.NotMemberException
      Authenticate a member among the members list of the social network by using the given credentials (login, password).
      Parameters:
      login - member's login.
      password - member's password.
      Returns:
      Member object if the the member is found, else null.
      Throws:
      exceptions.NotMemberException - if login does not match with the login of a registered member in SocialNetwork or if password does not correspond to his registered password.

    • removeMember

      public void removeMember​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password) throws exceptions.BadEntryException, exceptions.NotMemberException
      Removing a member among the members list of the social network by using the given credentials (login, password).
      Parameters:
      login - member's login.
      password - member's password.
      Throws:
      exceptions.BadEntryException -
      • if login is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if password is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character or contains less than 4 characters

      exceptions.NotMemberException - if login does not match with the login of a registered member in SocialNetwork or if password does not correspond to his registered password.

    • removeReviewItemFilm

      public void removeReviewItemFilm​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password) throws exceptions.BadEntryException, exceptions.NotMemberException, exceptions.NotItemException
      Removing a review given by a member on a specific film.
      Parameters:
      title - film's title
      login - member's login
      password - member's password
      Throws:
      exceptions.BadEntryException -
      • if login is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character
      • if password is not instantiated or contains less than one non-space character or contains less than 4 characters

      exceptions.NotMemberException - if login does not match with the login of a registered member in SocialNetwork or if password does not correspond to his registered password.
      exceptions.NotMemberException - if the review item doesn't exists for a specific member.
      exceptions.NotItemException
